text:
@TMobile @Tesla If I won a new long range Tesla Model 3 I would test the range as often as possible and do the ultimate cross country road trip. With this whole covid-19 thing we still have places to go, just no people to see. 😷 #TMobileTuesdays + #contest

📲: https://t.co/isEuDQt5zU
